name: 6D Global Technologies
description:
6D Global Technologies, Inc. is a premier digital experience solutions provider serving the digital marketing and technology needs of businesses worldwide. 6D Global offers a full suite of services to help large organizations optimize digital marketing channels and create better experiences for their customers, resulting in increased revenue growth and market share. 6D Global services include web experience, analytics, creative, mobile, and marketing management.
6D Global offers services worldwide and has offices in California, Portland, New York, Ohio, Minnesota and Dublin, Ireland.
